member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX
member.summary: Contains partition information for standard AT-style master boot record (MBR) and Extensible Firmware Interface (EFI) disks.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.PartitionStyle
member.summary: The format of the partition. For a list of values, see.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.StartingOffset
member.summary: The starting offset of the partition.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.PartitionLength
member.summary: The size of the partition, in bytes.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.RewritePartition
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the partition is rewritable. The value of this parameter should be set to TRUE.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Mbr
member.summary: A structure that specifies partition information specific to master boot record (MBR) disks. The MBR partition format is the standard AT-style format.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Gpt
member.summary: A structure that specifies partition information specific to GUID partition table (GPT) disks. The GPT format corresponds to the EFI partition format.
